attorneys.bio: Partner Name serves as Managing Partner of Mills Shirley LLP, bringing over 25 years of experience in corporate law and commercial litigation to the firm. Throughout their distinguished career, they have represented clients ranging from emerging businesses to Fortune 500 companies in complex legal matters.

attorneys.bio: Attorney Name is a Senior Associate at Mills Shirley LLP, focusing primarily on estate planning and probate law. With over 15 years of experience helping Texas families protect their legacies, they have developed a reputation for providing compassionate and comprehensive estate planning services.
